Generate a code snippet for initial population of access group profiles based on profiles from this infobase.
The code snippet is inserted in the %1 procedure of the %2 common module.
Generating a code snippet containing access kinds used in restriction of each right to each metadata object.

1. Open "All access restrictions" using the root of the Designer metadata objects tree. 2. Output the list of all columns into a spreadsheet document, select all, and copy to the clipboard. 3. In the spreadsheet document below, select all and paste from the clipboard.
Folder of ready configuration export to files
Contains prepared configuration export to files.

Generate a code snippet to get access kinds used in access right restrictions of metadata objects. Also notify of errors found in restriction texts.
The code snippet is used for pasting into the %1 procedure of the %2 common module.
Control of RLS text change command bar
Comparison is carried out to control unexpected restriction logic discrepancies in old and new RLS.

1. Before comparison all restriction texts are exported to files (a separate file for every object). Received files are compared with files of previous export restriction texts.
2. Instead of a folder with previous export files, you can specify configuration file ".cf". In this case, similar restriction texts will be exported from the specified configuration.
3. You can estimate the found changes accuracy manually.
